species.name: wigglytuff
descriptions: As it inhales, it expands...and expands...and expands. Wigglytuff compete to see which one can inflate itself the most.
It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a body slam.
Its body is full of elasticity. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.
Its fine fur feels so pleasant, those who accidentally touch it cannot take their hands away.
Its fur is extremely fine, dense, and supple. The exquisitely pleasant fur conveys an image of luxury.

abilities.name: cute-charm
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pok√©mon on contact.

abilities.name: competitive
abilities.effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

abilities.name: frisk
abilities.effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.
